data.title: Crysis 2 multiplayer demo coming next week, exclusive to Xbox 360
data.meta_description: Go to GamingNexus.com for news and reviews on video games, consoles, and PCs.
data.text:
by: Dan -

More On: Crysis 2

Three days and counting until Xbox Live Gold members can get their hands on an exclusive Crysis 2 multiplayer demo. As seen in a trailer John posted last month, the Nanosuit is the key to the game, as well as the core piece of the multiplayer demo. The demo will be situated in the “skyline” map and feature two of the game’s six game modes: “Team Instant Action” and “Crash Site.” Crysis 2 is schedule to hit retail outlets in North America on March 22nd for the Xbox 360, PS3 and PC.
